verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There in righteousness transcendent, Lo! He doth in Heav’n appear, Shows the blood of His atonement As thy title to be there.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}God now brings thee to His dwelling, Spreads for thee His feast divine, Bids thee welcome, ever telling What a portion there is thine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
